fields.title: Understanding Django Models
fields.subhead: A beginner's guide to database management in Django
fields.body: Django models are the foundation of database management in Django. This post covers how to define models, set up relationships, and use migrations to manage your database schema effectively.

fields.title: Introduction to REST APIs with Django Rest Framework
fields.subhead: Building your first REST API with Django Rest Framework
fields.body: Learn how to build a simple REST API using Django Rest Framework, including setting up serializers, views, and routing your endpoints.

fields.title: Mastering Git for Collaborative Development
fields.subhead: Tips and tricks for effective version control with Git
fields.body: Version control is a vital skill for developers. This post explores advanced Git commands, branching strategies, and how to resolve merge conflicts.

fields.title: Optimizing Web Performance with Lighthouse
fields.subhead: Use Lighthouse to improve your site's speed and user experience
fields.body: Google's Lighthouse tool provides actionable insights into improving web performance. Learn how to audit your site and address common performance issues.

fields.title: Introduction to Web Accessibility
fields.subhead: Why web accessibility matters and how to get started
fields.body: Web accessibility ensures your site is usable by everyone, including people with disabilities. This post provides an overview of accessibility guidelines and practical tips to implement them.

fields.title: Markdown Test Post
fields.body:
This is a post formatted with markdown
--------------------------------------

# Article Title

## Article Subhead

*This is emphasized* and **this is more emphasized**.

### Ordered Lists


1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item
    1. Indented item
    2. Indented item
4. Fourth item 


### Unordered Lists


- First item
- Second item
- Third item
    - Indented item
    - Indented item
- Fourth item 


### Block Quotes


> Dorothy followed her through many of the beautiful rooms in her castle.
>
> The Witch bade her clean the pots and kettles and sweep the floor and keep the fire fed with wood.


### Code Blocks


`inline codeblock`


```python
# A function in a codeblock
function codeblock(input):
    pass
```


### Images


![The San Juan Mountains are beautiful!](/assets/images/san-juan-mountains.jpg "San Juan Mountains")


### Links


And a [link to the Django website](https://www.djangoproject.com/).
